meanings.definition: Feeling or showing extreme sadness or gloominess.
meanings.sent1: After losing his favorite toy, Timmy looked the mopiest I've ever seen him.
meanings.sent2: She always looks the mopiest on rainy days.
meanings.sent3: Even the sunniest day couldn't chase away his mopiest mood.
meanings.sent4: Her face was the mopiest painting in the gallery of emotions.
meanings.sent5: The mopiest clouds hung low in the sky, matching his mood perfectly.

meanings.definition: The most sad or gloomy in a group.
meanings.sent1: In the class play, Sarah played the mopiest character with great emotion.
meanings.sent2: He was always the mopiest after a loss in the game.
meanings.sent3: The mopiest of the group, he still managed to make everyone smile with his jokes.
meanings.sent4: The old house on the corner looked like the mopiest one on the street.
meanings.sent5: Among the flowers, the mopiest one stood out with its drooping petals.
